page.title: 09Education,welfare(Harberton)
page.content: All children have to travel out of the area for their education. Primary school aged children go either to Harbertonford, Diptford, or Dartington, while secondary education is provided by a comprehensive school and sixth form college in Totnes. Further and adult education is available mainly outside the area although a few village based classes have recently started up. All health care facilities are available in Totnes, with Doctors, a group practice, clinics, Dentists and a small cottage hospital. For emergency treatment etc patients have to be transferred to Torbay or Plymouth.
